subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Tom Pecora, the former Hofstra coach who was introduced as Fordham’s coach, inherits a team that was 2-26 this season and has struggled since joining the Atlantic 10.
snippet: Tom Pecora, the former Hofstra coach who was introduced as Fordham’s coach, inherits a team that was 2-26 this season and has struggled since joining the Atlantic 10.
